data: Ulva | Lunga | Dutchman's Cap | Atlantic | Castle Dare | Mull

The sun had sunk behind the lonely western seas; Ulva, and Lunga, and the Dutchmanâ€™s Cap had grown dark on the darkening waters; and the smooth Atlantic swell was booming along the sombre caves; but up here in Castle Dare, on the high and rocky coast of Mull, the great hall was lit with such a blaze of candles as Castle Dare had but rarely seen.
